body:
Applications for Cass-Morgan Farm Bureau Foundation scholarships are now available.

Scholarship recipients must be a member or dependent of a Cass-Morgan Farm Bureau member, plan to attend or currently attend a two- or four-year college offering courses in agriculture science must be pursuing a degree in agriculture.

Applications must be turned in by 5 p.m. March 31. They are available at Cass-Morgan Farm Bureau office, Cass County Extension Office and Morgan County Extension Office and in high school agriculture departments and guidance counselor offices.
title: FB scholarship applications available
